channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 瑞士国家银行行长托马斯-乔丹表示，中东冲突可能会给全球央行带来重大问题
item.description:
The conflict in the Middle East could spark major problems for the central banks around the world, according to Swiss National Bank President Thomas Jordan https://t.co/vxp0HnR4wc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 摩根大通分析师称，NatWest 正在为英国政府提前退出该银行股份奠定基础
item.description:
NatWest is laying the groundwork for the UK government to exit its stake in the bank sooner than expected, according to JPMorgan analysts https://t.co/l65h0Kfu0D

item.title: 住房问题将是加拿大即将公布的预算的重点，财政部长克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）将强调采取措施加快建设速度，增加经济适用房的供应量，并可能利用政府土地来实现这一目标。
item.description:
Housing will be the focus of Canada’s upcoming budget, with Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland emphasizing measures to speed up construction and boost the supply of affordable homes — possibly using government land to do it. https://t.co/NGQC8w246T

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 在英格兰银行两位最鹰派的决策者撤回对加息的支持后，英镑下跌，金边债券上涨
item.description:
The pound fell and gilts gained after two of the Bank of England’s most hawkish policymakers withdrew their support for rate hikes https://t.co/eqJBLeCDfP

item.title: 消息人士称，胡塞武装分子告诉中国和俄罗斯，他们的船只可以在红海和亚丁湾航行而不会受到攻击
item.description:
Houthi militants have told China and Russia their ships can sail through the Red Sea and Gulf of Aden without being attacked, sources say https://t.co/qWZdh1GcDv

item.title: 肯尼亚总统威廉-鲁托的政府希望通过实施所谓的 "自下而上战略"，加快经济增长速度，到 2027 年将经济增长率提高到 7.2%。
item.description:
Kenyan President William Ruto’s administration wants to speed up economic growth to 7.2% by 2027 by implementing its so-called Bottom-Up Strategy https://t.co/trnHMcWj48

item.title: 面对胡塞武装的袭击，无法追踪保险的老旧船只在红海航行，增加了环境破坏的风险
item.description:
Older ships with untraceable insurance are navigating the Red Sea in the face of Houthi attacks, increasing the risk of environmental damage https://t.co/GH87RDIkNK

item.title: 债券投资者对欧洲利用其投资银行为国防开支提供资金的可能性持怀疑态度，他们认为贷款人的可持续发展能力存在风险，而且借贷成本也会提高。
item.description:
The possibility that Europe will tap its investment bank to fund defense spending is being met with skepticism from bond investors, who flag risks to the lender’s sustainability credentials and higher borrowing costs https://t.co/fUHNVJ9xOE

item.title: 化石燃料行业领袖在 CERAWeek 上联合抨击美国冻结液化天然气出口许可，@ruthcoverslng 写道

item.title: 由于政府拖延向供应商付款，以及法院禁止出售抵押品以挽回损失，总部位于内罗毕的 KCB 银行清理其贷款账簿上遗留坏账的努力受挫。
item.description:
Nairobi-based lender KCB’s efforts to clean up its loan book of legacy bad debt is being frustrated by government delays in paying suppliers and court injunctions slowing down the sale of collateral to recoup losses https://t.co/C0nfh1QvU5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）所在的社会民主党联合领导人表示，如果德国希望在未来几年将国防开支维持在北约目标之上，就必须放宽债务限制。
item.description:
Germany will have to loosen its debt restrictions if it wants to maintain defense spending above NATO’s target in coming years, according to the co-leader of Chancellor Olaf Scholz’s Social Democratic Party https://t.co/tXc65j0a0r

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）为上海新店揭幕，标志着苹果公司将中国作为市场和生产基地的承诺

item.title: 澳大利亚和英国选择防务制造商 BAE 和 ASC 组建下一代核动力潜艇舰队，这是奥克斯安全条约的最新进展

item.title: 一小部分精明的投资者在阿根廷创纪录的 500 亿美元地方债务置换中获得了 20% 的收益，尽管他们并未实际交出符合条件的债券

item.title: 阿布扎比最大的上市公司，由酋长国王室的一位重要成员领导，正寻求在明年之前将一家价值超过 270 亿美元的控股公司上市

item.title: 对于思科而言，280 亿美元收购 Splunk 不仅标志着其迄今为止最大的多元化努力，也标志着向净债务资本地位的历史性转变
item.description:
For Cisco, the $28 billion acquisition of Splunk marks not only its biggest diversification effort to date but a historic shift to a net debt capital position https://t.co/TTXpajjwLn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 在周一支持重组计划后，Signa 旗下一个重要房地产部门的债券持有人仍要求对价值约 6.75 亿欧元的一批资金失踪一事做出答复
item.description:
After backing a restructuring plan on Monday, bondholders of one of Signa’s key property units are still demanding answers over a missing batch of funds worth around €675 million https://t.co/pChJ6pM9zo

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：土耳其在地方选举前意外加息以稳定里拉汇率

item.description:
